Review.Titre: I was fully charged upon order
Review.Contenu: I was fully charged upon order, but never received the book I ordered on 11/21/23, nor have I gotten any update on status.  Prior to reconciling the statement, I plan to dispute the charger.

Tracking #786963315130 a concern.Package has been somewhere in Memphis Tennessee since Oct. 26th.  Original delivery date to Midhurst, Ontario Canada was December 1st.  They cannot find the package.I spoke with an agent at FedEx on Thursday, Dec. 7th and they specified that Solentro was to email them with a picture of the package and description of the contents, (3 photo books).  I relayed that info to info@Solentro that same day and I have heard nothing back.  I resent the FedEx request particulars again yesterday and still have not heard back.  Please assist to bring this delivery challenge to a close.Angie DeMarco

Review.Titre: I hope to revisit this review and give…
Review.Contenu: I hope to revisit this review and give a higher rating. My package was lost by the shipper and it never arrived. I've emailed Solentro customer service and have not received a reply yet.This was a book my son created and we were hoping to have them by Christmas.

Review.Titre: I have yet to receive my order
Review.Contenu: I have yet to receive my order. As far as I can tell this is a problem with the shipping company trusted to deliver my books but so far I have not gotten any answers from the shipper or Solentro as to whether or not I will ever get what I paid quite a bit to have printed. I was waiting to write a review, hoping, but so far I can get no answers so here is my review: I got nothing.

Review.Titre: Seems my order got lost and I still haven’t gotten a replacement
Review.Contenu: I reached out, as soon as I made the order, to fix my address. Someone contact me from their team, before shipping, to let me know that they requested the change. Apparently it did not went through. One month later, with a lot of emails from both parties; the shipment went back and I still haven’t gotten my package.

I was pretty disappointed by the customer service this time around. I placed the order in late December (23rd), and had minimal communication leading up to the Jan 7 delivery. I had to email the staff twice to actually find out. One, I never got a follow up email explaining my order was being tended two. Two, I never got an email explaining my order had been shipped/showing me a tracking #. Finally, it took over 2-weeks start to finish, and I feel last year it didn't take that long. I also felt the packaging was too loose. The books seriously moved around and incurred slight bending on the edges, despite the plastic packaging. Just pretty disappointed compared to last year's order. This is especially true when I'm paying an arm and a leg for shipping. It's frustrating when shipping is 25% of the order cost, and the delivery is poor/not communicated well.

Review.Titre: I have tried to communicate with this…
Review.Contenu: I have tried to communicate with this website and NOT one response to try to purchase a gift certificate for a Christmas present. There is no option to be able to do this on the site itself. Very pathetic!! I don't recommend this business!

Crap, I have emailed them about 5 times and ZERO reaction. They only emailed me about money (where it is). Still waiting on my order. Placed my order Januari 1, 2022. Don't expect it to arrive anymore, because of this crappy kind of customer care.

Review.Titre: Book was lost for weeks with no…
Review.Contenu: Book was lost for weeks with no resolution. Missed gift opportunity for an important occasion with plenty of time planned up front for delivery.
It’s four days til Christmas. I put my order in 3 weeks ago - haven’t gotten the bound book yet, so holding opinion for now

Review.Titre: I am waiting for a response twice now…
Review.Contenu: I am waiting for a response twice now from them.  Having questions of how people add to a book that I am making.  No response.  I am concerned this will not work..

Review.Titre: Package was supposed to be delivered…
Review.Contenu: Package was supposed to be delivered last week and i still have not received it.

Review.Titre: Entices you but the prices are through the roof!
Review.Contenu: Their interface works but is clunky. You can't set up a page header, and you can't carry font family and size from one page to the other. The worst part is their prices are through the roof! I set up what I thought was going to be a simple silly book with a quote from an individual on each page. The price quote for 78 pages was $109 PER COPY. Yeah, that ain't happening.

Review.Titre: Ordered a book mid July, still not here two months later
Review.Contenu: Ordered a book mid July. Checked in late August because it still hadn’t arrived. They said they’d check with the shipping company. It’s September 12, two months after I’ve ordered and still no book. They won’t send a replacement until they can prove it’s lost. How long do I have to wait???

I never received my books.  I didn't realize the company was out of the country until I had placed the order.  When I emailed them, the tracking they gave me didn't work.  They had my address wrong, and told me it was my fault and that I would have to wait for the shipment to be returned before they would ship it out again.  So the special surprise gift for Christmas didn't happen.  Very disappointed.  They should have shipped another one out immediately and looked to take care of their customers.

I've put my order in a month ago and was told 3 weeks from time of purchase I have yet to recieve my item. Furthermore, I was not provided with a tracking number although it was considered  "priority" mailing. Im highly disappointed.

Review.Titre: Slow delivery, challenging communication, and so-so quality
Review.Contenu: I was exceptionally disappointed to receive a book I ordered on Dec. 6 many days late.  I had received a promotional email from Solentro saying they would be turning books around quickly in time for Christmas, but I didn't receive mine in time to sign it and ship it to the ultimate recipient without paying for next day air service.  I tried twice to find out the status and was told (after some time) that it would be fine, but it wasn't.  There should be a way to see your status online.  After this experience, I will stick with Shutterfly, which has a higher quality product and quick turnaround plus exceptional customer service.

I specifically checked shipping times before paying $65 for a SINGLE book to be printed. Their site said (shipping within the US) which leads you to believe they are a US based company. Their site also specified that if you ordered before the 16th of December (8pm PST) you would receive your product before Christmas... well here we are the 22nd and my order is still in SWEDEN!!! My order was placed the 14th.  Very frustrated to say the least...DO NOT promise something on your website when you know that it cannot be delivered by that date. That is false advertisement and leads people to make orders with you that you cannot fulfill on your end in the promised time frame.You can search Google and see that this is something your company offers every year it seems.
I will not be using Solentro again. Customer service was rude and not helpful.

Delivery was not on time, but your website and service is interesting.This site doesn't allow for a reply to a company reply so here's my follow up.I did not see your shipping information on the website, that's my fault.  I placed the order before Christmas and I don't expect it to be there on Christmas.  I also placed the order late in the night thinking that day one would start the next business day.  What is misleading is when the product is being shipped by FedEx saying that it will be delivered on 12/29 and it arrives later on 1/4.  Fix the way you work with FedEx so they don't provide misleading information or state to a consumer that they should not trust the FedEx delivery date.

Pretty disappointed.   I was hoping to have this book ready in time for leading into my proposal, but there has been no notification on getting it shipped and estimated delivery date.   I get that it is the holidays but it would be nice to know when I should expect it by.   I took the risk and it did not pay off well

I started to write a book and spent several hours copy and pasting each page in. (It only takes a few minutes if you've already typed it all out on one document.) I had 44 pages done and was curious how much that was going to cost me. I was floored to see it was already over $100 and I was only half done. Deleted everything and am on to better things.  When they list book prices I have no idea where they come up with those low prices; that is VERY deceiving.

The website was fine. It would be nice if you had a mobile option that works fluently. The trouble I’m having is it’s already been two days and no contact about anything being shipped. How long does it take to print this and put it in a binder? Hoping that this gets shipped soon for my wife’s birthday!

I ordered my product on July 15th and it is now August 9th and I have yet to receive it. The tracking was terrible on my product, after it left Sweden I received no further updates. Their customer service number doesn’t offer English support. And they rarely respond to customer complaint emails. One of the worst purchases I’ve ever made.

Review.Titre: I honestly was dissapointed in the…
Review.Contenu: I honestly was dissapointed in the quality and look of the book I made. I felt a little bit ripped off and that I could have made something similar on my own for a lot less money. I paid nearly 60 USD for one softcover book. I added a star for the fast and secure shipping. I did appreciate that.

I Love the book and it was easy. I gave it a 2 because your price was very misleading and never showed as far as the price  pre pages or group of pages. The price was still the same regardless  if it was 1 page or 32 cost me $80 too much​, if you read this review advise you to try someone else but if money is No Object help your self

Review.Titre: Way too expensive for a just photo book

Review.Contenu: Hi Solentro,I have sent an email to you today and not heard back, I have also ordered the book, noticed that the money has gone through but have still not had any feedback or confirmation via email that my book is being processed.Please could you reply to my email.....Trudy Wilkes

This was my first attempt at publishing a book.  The pictures came out amazingly clear, as they were all over 50 years old.  I was very impressed with the quality. I was not impressed with the editing powers of your software.  I wish we could have purchased one copy so we could see it in print and edit it it. Having to buy 10 made us just buy 20 as we would only pay shipping once. When we got it and started reading it, it was filled with errors that had not come up on your editing screen.  I put the copy in Google doc and it caught over 50 changes in both spelling and editing.  We switched to another medium and ordered one and caught another 50 mistakes. We had spent $200 on books that at first glance looked amazing, but we’re riddled with errors.  You should have a disclaimer that states your editing program is weak.  Also in allowing us to purchase one copy we could have seen the finished product, fixed it and then ordered the number we required. It would have resulted in a much happier customer.

I love the final product, but getting there is a bit torturous. While adding images throughout the book, the platform would, for no obvious reason, periodically delete pages. I had to constantly re-submit info. It was so incredibly frustrating. In the end one of the pages came out wrong. I can only surmise it was because after multiple times of having to redo pages, I missed fixing this one for the nth time because I wasn’t aware it had been affected. Ah well.  Also, I used this platform back in 2016 and was surprised that today it functioned pretty much the exact same way, no advancements in functionality.
Customer services was excellent even during the holidays.

Review.Pseudo: You are b o o t i f u l
Review.Titre: Would recommend checking the countries they ship to before writing.
Review.Contenu: I was really excited to order this book and was really passionate about it. But unfortunately I couldn't order it because of my country, since my country was not on the list of countries they shipped to. I have now given up on this website and on writing as now I know how silly I was to think this was actually going to work out. I'm not even mad as I'm extremely used to this because my country is not a very popular country. I don't want to try a new website as I had already written so much on this website, so I will just have to give up.

We give Five Stars for the quality of the books and for the speed, especially ahead of the holidays, that they were delivered.  Truly amazing!We would give Two Stars for the formatting process, because the templates were so hard to work with.  My husband solved this by creating images of our pictures and text, and then pasting them onto your single photo template.  Once this was figured out, it went smoothly.  We would happily send our work to you all again.  Thank you!

Review.Titre: Expensive but quick way to create a…
Review.Contenu: Expensive but quick way to create a vanity book project for a few books. Turnaround time is extremely fast. Difficult to really edit book on your own.What you see and how you edit are radically different. I wanted to eliminate some pages and it was a lengthy, convoluted process. The final product was sleek looking. Limited styles to choose from for covers. If you want a small, personal project done it is an acceptable method.

The book I had made is a great quality, but certainly not worth $95 US!!! I only paid that because I was under a time constraint & ran out of options, but would never use this company again due to it's extremely over priced products. It could have at least been leather bound or something to justify that kind of money!!

Review.Titre: Print quality and software is great but images not centered on pages
Review.Contenu: The book format in hard cover and quality of printing is excellent however the images and type are not centered on the page although they are set up centered on the book creating software. (A full page image prints with a white bar on the outer edge of the page.  It seems that the software does not consider bleed in the internal spine of the pages.

I found the text pages easy to use, however I must agree with another reviewer who said that creating the cover for the book was confusing. The cover sheet that I typed my title on had a design on half the page yet I now think that the cover of my book will be all blank on top with the tile below the middle which will look very awkward. I thought this design would be on the cover since the other text pages were blank. I'll just have to wait and see.

The website was fairly straightforward to navigate but could have been more user friendly. Overall the simplicity of formatting was a positive for me. Payment was a little tricky, but my bank halted payment initially. It would also be nice if there were separate entries for billing address and shipping address. Shipment was miraculously fast, and I am deeply appreciative of how quickly my order was processed once payment was figured out. I was also very pleased with the look and feel of the book once I received it.

Review.Titre: My Poem book for 93 year old mother
Review.Contenu: I finally got my book completed but felt the site could have been more user friendly. It would also be nice if an inserted picture could be screened back to be a true background without having to change colors of font. The choices for picking a style of book could have been more diverse. I was making a poem book for my 93 year old mom and wanted a book with a flower theme but none to chose from. Even your designers had nothing for a book. Only invitations, etc. My mom loves her book! It took me over 40 hours to create.The quality is very good. Thought the price was high.

Review.Titre: The product is nice, but costly
Review.Contenu: The product is nice, and they got it to me very quickly, but it cost way more than I was expecting. The prices are very vague, and I have no idea how mine came to total $80 for a 100 page book that was black and white (except for the cover)

The prices are very high in comparison to competitors, and with paperbacks, you can only buy ten books at a time. Otherwise, the website is easy to use and the shipping is quite fast. Overall an OK experience using Solentro.
They were quick to print and get the order out but getting to the United States took forever. I think next time around I will find a printer in this country.
I thought the editing options were limited.  The compounds were separated on two line instead of moving the entire word to the next line. Not very cost effective for one book.

Review.Titre: I was unable to complete my purchase
Review.Contenu: I was unable to complete my purchase.  Tip to US citizens: clear it with your credit csrd before trying to purchase from this site; mine blocked the purchase.

The final product was satisfactory, in particular the reproductions of the photos selected for the book.   I was somwhat disappointed about the first and final pages, as it was not clear to me how they would appear behind the clear front and back covers chosen. Had I realized this, I would have chosen a photo to be on the front page.   I also could not tell when typing into the pages that the type would be as large as it was, and could have gotten some poems on one page rather than two.  However, the quality of the printing and the paper was very good.  I found the entry of information a bit awkward as I had to go the the revew each time I wanted to see how it actually laid out on the page, which was time consuming, as it did not display the same way when entering it.  I would have like to be able to move the pages around, but found that in order to revise the order of the pages, I had to delete and add a page and retype all over again in order to place it in a different order.

Review.Titre: Slow production, unable to view or track order status
Review.Contenu: The Solentro site was user friendly and all was good until production. I needed this for a birthday gift and shipping to the US. The site says 1-2 weeks, but I did not know if that included ship time. The site does not give any details about shipment method or shipment time, so I asked customer service. They could not give me that information either. (?) I asked if I could pay extra for expedited production and/or shipment. They do not offer that and said they would mark my order as "pressing". It was produced in the normal timeframe. There is no visibility online regarding production progress, ship date or ship method (thus no way to calculate arrival date), but, thankfully, they did provide tracking information upon request. I now appreciate even more the US companies that are able to produce and ship in a matter of a few days, plus I can see online exactly when/how my package has been shipped and will be delivered. Solentro produces a nice product, but the production and shipping information and timeframe could be improved.
Shouldn't charge to take Solentro promotional messages off of the book.

I bought a hardcover/gloss Maxi panorama book with 50 pages in full color for $110 USD.Cons:The pages feel a bit thin and rough for gloss, I did double check to make sure they were gloss and not matte, I suppose I just expected them to be a bit thicker. The book itself is quite thin, a little over a centimeter in thickness with the hardcover included.I experienced some technical issues whilst making the book in that pictures would randomly shift onto different pages or be removed entirely, even after having saved them to pages in particular, which meant I had to go through every page after each time I'd adjusted the pictures.The site could have some more default background images provided.I would have liked for there to have been a text background option to increase readability within the text on a colored background.Pros:The colors are vibrant and beautiful.I did have to contact customer support and received an answer very shortly after that helped me resolve some issues I was having in creating the book.The book was safely packaged in tight plastic wrap and then packaged in a sturdy box.Overall:I like the book as it is. It's a 60th birthday present for my mother and I'm glad I was able to customize it as I did and it gave it that much more meaning. The process of building the book itself was a bit tedious and did become an annoyance at times, but there's great customer support. The quality of the pages themselves are not what I expected, and the book is overpriced, in my opinion. If I were to have the need to order another book I would be hesitant about ordering through Solentro again. The quality is good and the colors are vibrant, it's just... Not what I expected.
Started out good ... ended up bad...

Review.Titre: Book came out much better than I…
Review.Contenu: Book came out much better than I expected. Looks very good and shipping via fedex was fast. My only issue is the website needs getting used to and there is no undo button. If you delete pages by mistake, there is no undo button and you have to write the deleted pages all over again. Still, satisfied with how the book looked.

I found the Solentro experience of making my own, personal photo book a positive one. The site could have had a little better functionality but as far as sites go, it was relatively easy to navigate. I appreciated the templates and the fact that I could easily import my own photos. The cost was a bit high but after receiving the book, I felt the quality was worth the expense.

UK CUSTOMERS: When the book is delivered you may get a batch of slightly confusing paperwork relating to import tax. I was a bit freaked out by this as I’ve had to pay a lot for other deliveries from Europe since Brexit. Thanks to Solentro for sorting this out and reassuring me- it’s safe to ignore.As far as the product is concerned, it’s very nice. A few contributors seemed to find it tricky to upload photos as well as their messages, also it would be worth telling people not to use emojis as the text section can’t accept them. Overall we have a very nice memento and the recipient is delighted with it.

Review.Titre: I created a lovely book of poetry with…
Review.Contenu: I created a lovely book of poetry with vibrant colors.  The book is high quality and beautiful.  I will definitely use Solentro for all my projects.  The only issue I had, was that it was some what difficult to correct any page errors that I made. It is not easy to access tech support. However, after much persistence and patience it was all perfect.  Thank you.

Review.Titre: Expensive and Time Consuming  but Great Final Product
Review.Contenu: I chose Solentro because it was the only company I could find that allowed text and photos. Creating the book was very time consuming because you can't edit a page once you've chosen the format which means starting the page all over. The book was also significantly more expensive (and smaller) than any photo book I've made with other photo book companies but I am happy with the end result.

The only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is the lack of customer service. Other people said the same thing on their review but that the end product was great, so I crossed my fingers & went with it. You're on your own, but if you can figure it out it's worth it. Our project was a birthday book for our 85 year old mother/grandmother, but not a picture book/photo album so this company fills a niche no other company seems to fill. Fun backgrounds, colorful pages & fonts. I like that I could preview the book while working on it.  Turns out the company is out of Sweden so that might explain the lack of customer service, but the book made it to me ok and shipping cost was not out of line.

Pricing is confusing.  The amount of the purchase was one price, the invoice was more than double what I expected. Impossible to get anyone to talk to me. Emails are often disjointed from the questions I had.  Although I love creating books, I can’t afford its pricing .

The product was very good, better than expected. The price was a little high, and the breakdown for buying more copies isn't very good either. If I could get a better price I would buy more, sadly I only purchased a few because of the price.

Review.Titre: I was very pleased with the quality of…
Review.Contenu: I was very pleased with the quality of the books and how easy they were to create. With that said, I wasn't pleased with the $50.00 shipping cost or the lack of communication along the way. I made them 2 weeks before Christmas, and although I knew they may not be delivered in time, I had no way to track the books. There was no follow-up email with a receipt, order confirmation, or any additional information allowing me to know when/if my order went through. An email supplying me with a link to track my package would have also been appreciated.

I love the book, and this being my second, I was more facile with the software. The finished product is terrific and the ability to preview the book exactly how it will appear is great. The only weakness is that there is a lot of trial and error involved in constructing page templates and fitting in text and pictures in the way you want. But the end product is definitely worth it!!

Excellent, excellent customer service. And I was a difficult case. I believe part of the issue was the 11 year old MacBook  Pro with a Word program not supported since 2016. A lot of manual manipulation to deal with hidden formatting from the cut and paste from Word. The eraser tool in the Solentro software did not seem to work with this old of a Mac computer. However, there was a manual,  time consuming work around. Bottom line my second book  was successfully completed. Based on my experience, I believe it would benefit users of the Solentro software to know what makes and models of computers pc and Mac) and operating systems work well with the Solentro software and result in the best user experience. The Solentro software meets the 80/20 principle. 80% good core/20% customizable. Looking forward to doing my next book on a newer MacBook Pro computer.

Review.Titre: I liked the product and the format
Review.Contenu: I liked the product and the format.  It was fairly easy to load my info but did take a bit of time.  My order was processed quickly.  However, it was estimated to be delivered by December 15, plenty of time for the holiday.  It got stuck in FedEx France for over 2 weeks.   It didn't arrive until December 28.  Also, I had some trouble with the pictures.  Apparently, it wants good quality pictures but I was using older photos and it didn't like it.

Review.Titre: I have never made a book before
Review.Contenu: I have never made a book before, and I’m not very tech savvy, but Solentro made it very easy. I actually took a story that my husband wrote when he was in grade school and turned it into a children’s book. It turned out very well and is great quality and their customer service was great and they were quick to respond to my emails. The only reason I didn’t give five stars was it did not get here in time for Christmas. I think it was more FedEx‘s fault than Solentro‘s. Solentro sent it out in plenty of time but it was super delayed from FedEx.  That part was disappointing, but I will definitely use Solentro in the future to make any kind of book as the process was very simple and the quality was great

Review.Titre: The site worked well for my book…
Review.Contenu: The site worked well for my book project. I liked the flexibility to create custom page layouts. The only improvement I would like to see is the ability to adjust line spacing in text blocks. It defaults to single spacing. Spacing of 1.15 and 1.5 lines would allow me to open the look of the text up.

Review.Titre: Great Platform for a Custom Book…
Review.Contenu: Used Solentro to design a custom book for the 50th birthday of a friend. The entire user experience was very pleasant. Overall, the process was intuitive and simple. It might help to have the structure of the book preset before beginning the actual layout in the template, as editing at times is cumbersome and requires repeating some steps. By far, the most versatile platform for this kind of project. The weakest link is delivery time. Getting the book took forever even though I ordered it 3 weeks in advance and it was shipped via Fedex. Regrettably, the gift didn't make it in time; when my friend did finally get it, she loved the execution. I was tracking the shipment and noticed that it was stuck in a warehouse in Belgium for 8 days. Unacceptable. So if you are going to use this service for a specific event, design your book way in advance. I would use the service again and would recommend it to others as there are different format options and price points to meet different people's needs.

Review.Titre: Great way to make a book, with a few quirks.
Review.Contenu: I used Solentro to create a hardcover book for my daughter chronicling an imaginary world we created over three years as part of a bedtime routine.  Solentro let me pull in photos and illustrations, lay out text in various ways, and use color.  The interface does have a few limitations, which is why I've rated Solentro four stars instead of five.  One is that layouts are modified and applied independently of where they are filled in, so it's tricky to make small changes to a layout to correct problems in spacing you see as you're filling it.  You need to go back to the layout screen; create a new, derivative layout; make the changes; apply that layout to the book, which in turn adds a page and pushes everything forward; drag each content element from the old page to the new one; and finally delete the old page.  I went through this numerous times.  I also wish page numbers were easier to add and customize, that there was an assisted function to create an index, and that multi-page images were more predictable in terms of center binding.Despite these limitations, I enjoyed the way that Solentro helped me bring my vision into reality.  The finished book came out quite well, and my daughter and I were both delighted with the quality of the printing.  I did encounter some glue breaking between the very first page and cover and again with the very last page and cover.  I fixed these by running a strip from a Crafter's Tape gluerunner down the inner edge of both pages.  I found no other issues.A note of caution: Solentro is a way to print something special, not to make something for sale.  The book I made was an 8x6 hardcover spanning about 50 pages in full color, and the price was a little over $100.  For a special gift, this was just fine. It wouldn't be viable to use this system to create books at a saleable price.

Review.Titre: Book turned out great but I didn’t…
Review.Contenu: Book turned out great but I didn’t receive any shipping emails so I had no idea when it was gonna come in. Book adhesive also started to melt under hot temps

Review.Titre: While compiling my work was fairly…
Review.Contenu: Whhile compiling my work was fairly easy, it was frustrating to not be able to enlarge the pages for review as i put it together.

Review.Titre: It was a great way to get my…
Review.Contenu: It was a great way to get my autobiography published for my family. My only complaint is there is no spell check. If there is, I didn't see it. It bothers me that my book has typos. But I would do it again.

Review.Titre: Shipping is slow but they did well
Review.Contenu: They processed and shipped my order quickly

Review.Titre: Good product. On time. Totally satisfied
Review.Contenu: Good Product. Delivered at the time promised. Would recommend the service.

Review.Titre: I would have liked updates on the books…
Review.Contenu: I would have liked updates on the books completion and information about when it was shipped and delivered.
This company was amazing. I was able to write my book in about three months and it turned out great! The only problem was that the colored book are really expensive.

Review.Titre: I received my order after three weeks
Review.Contenu: I received my order after three weeks, and as I waited the customer service was very responsive to informing me about the shipment updates.

Review.Titre: We wold like for the thumbnails to be a…
Review.Contenu: We wold like for the thumbnails to be a bit larger, and a bit easier to edit texts.  Books are very nice.  Excellent work
My book was awsome when I finished it! It turned out great and it was so easy to make!

Review.Titre: The final product and the quality of…
Review.Contenu: The final product and the quality of the reproduced pictures were excellent as was the speed of delivery following the order. A user should definitely complete writing their text and proofread before inserting it due to the lack of a spell check feature and the very small size of the print in the review tab. Creation of a Table of Contents is difficult because what you see is not what prints as page numbers end up on the next line down.

Easy to use. Happy with the quality. Used to create a book for my son's short stories. Copy pasted text from Google docs easily. Adding pictures was not so easy. If the story took up almost  three pages, and you wanted to drop a picture in the extra space at the bottom of the 3rd page- you had to change templates and retype that section if the story. I would have been easier to add an image box- size it then drop picture in. Otherwise loved it. Will use again when there is a sale.

I enjoyed the ability to put this book project together that Solentro was able to help me with. It was easy to figure out along with the tutorials. I do wish there were more options for certain parts, but I can't complain because they allowed me to create exactly what I wanted.

Review.Titre: I put together a 20 page book and it…
Review.Contenu: I put together a 20 page book and it was generally user-friendly and I was delighted with the result.  I liked the way text automatically moved to successive pages.  One area of improvement relates to templates.  It would be easier if I could change the size allocated to text/photos by adjusting the size right on the page through dragging rather than having to create a new template each time I wanted to revise.  There was a lot of trial and error, especially with photos, to get the right proportions.

Review.Titre: I  had the opportunity to order from…
Review.Contenu: I  had the opportunity to order from three different book companies.  I like the finished product from Solentro, but it was not the easiest book project application to use. Also I felt the templates for pictures were limited and the quality was less. Granted I couldn't figure out how to customize templates, which is an option. Also it was one of the more expensive for a non hardback option.

Review.Titre: Great site to create your book
Review.Contenu: Great site to create your book. Very helpful customer service. After losing about 60 pages of my typing one night, I emailed them and they responded promptly and recovered it by the next morning. The only reason for four stars is they are a little expensive when you get ready to print the book. I have had to put off my printing for now. But would definitely use them again.

Review.Titre: I love my books everything was way better
Review.Contenu: I love my books, everything was way better than I expected. Great covers, the glossy thick pages. the color was fantastic, and my books arrived much faster than I expected.  I did find however, the App is not really user friendly, and took some figuring out (I am  techno Challanged), but once i figured it all out, then it was really easy to do.  I am impressed with the work and speed at which I got my books in these troubled times.  The Covid-19 is giving most a hard time so THANK YOU for all you are doing.

I have used Solentro twice for self-published books.  They are a little pricey, but the results are beautiful and delivery is quick.  The only drawback is getting used to the format and editing features, adding photos or making sure your text is on the page correctly.  They also have a feature for adding an ISBN number if you want your work copyrighted.

Quality was great!  Price got out of control - I paid more than double than what I expected -Every time someone was looking at my photo book - I jokingly would say: this only cost $75 -- Then watch person's face go WOW!! & proceed to turn pages more' gently -- ha Really happy with my book BUT unsure if I would do it again

Review.Titre: Easy to make, beautiful work but pricey
Review.Contenu: Found Solentro while looking for book publishers. It took me a about 15 mins to figure out how to use their system to create a book, but once I did it smooth. Once my creation was complete, and I went to have it priced, it was straight forward. Pricing was a little high, but I went ahead and made the purchase to see how the books would turn out. Received the book in about a week and half and it was amazing! Still a little pricey but it turned out greats. So the pricing is the only reason for my 4 rating.

Review.Titre: I was very pleased with the final…
Review.Contenu: I was very pleased with the final product.  It was very easy to download pictures and type subtext for the pictures.  It was a little frustrating to copy and paste the text from my Word document and then find errors on the print preview. I would just caution users to read every word of the text.  My only issue is I don't like that hyphenated words get spilt onto different lines; it didn't show that it was going to do that on the print preview.  Overall, I would recommend this program highly.
The product is very good, but I think the price is a little high.6 books at $77 each.

Pretty easy to use, high quality product, fast shipping. It's probably not possible, but one improvement would be the ability to resize photo templates on custom pages without creating a whole new page. Otherwise, quite happy with the experience.

Solentro worked beautifully to make a personalized picture and word book.  The best thing about it was the fact that if I had questions or didn't understand something, they were right there to guide me through.  Some of my pictures were not the greatest resolution, but they did a beautiful job making them as resolute as they could be.

I wrote a storybook for my young child. Overall I'm incredibly satisfied with the finished product.  The website was easy to navigate and the templates were simple to use. However, I did find that I disliked the templates as provided- the picture sizes were odd and cropping was difficult. Additionally, spacing the text on the page was not ideal. In the end though, the quality of product I received was great and I am very happy with the final book.

Review.Titre: I found it to be an excellent value
Review.Contenu: I found it to be an excellent value. The speed of delivery was also excellent.I had a little difficulty getting my input to the pages, but was able to do whatever I needed.I am planning on a second edition soon. The book was well received by the friends who reviewed.

Review.Titre: Great UX and finished product, but at a cost
Review.Contenu: Solentro’s UI is easy to use and helped me write a text heavy book with some digitally enhanced photos from WWII. The results came out great, but the costs are very high for printing and shipping. So absolutely no knocks on the quality of the finished product, but pricey.

Great finished product. Arrived really fast. Nice to be able to include both text and photos in a way that fit my needs. Once I figured it out, was really easy to create my book. Only challenge was creating my own template, which took a lot of tries to figure out. Will definitely use again in the future.

Review.Titre: I made a book for my daughter's 30th…
Review.Contenu: I made a book for my daughter's 30th birthday. Making it personal with all her favorites in the 1st year of her birth year along with events and price of things that happened that year. #1 songs each year top movie, tv..  put pictures in of every year of her life. It came out so great! I was really impressed. Ship when they said it would arrive. My only complaint was it was not user friendly. When you change font size kept adding pages. Trouble getting it back threw off picture templets when changing to writing. But it was worth it! Loved it!

Review.Titre: The final product is extremely well…
Review.Contenu: The final product is extremely well done and the company is very professional.  The program to create the book is a little hard to use, not user friendly, but once you work with it you can figure out the best way to modify things.  Would definitely use them again for my next project.

We thought the quality of the spiral was good. We had wished for more latitude regarding getting hardback quality with fewer pages than what is required since it is a children's book. That and the price per copy were a bit prohibitive. Shipping was quick and the book arrived in very good condition.

Our book is beautiful. And we are starting to write another one. It's a great program and the customer service is outstanding. Our only suggestion is to incorporate spell (and possibly grammar) check into the text to support the proofing process.

My experiences have been very satisfactory. I “lost” my draft a couple of times but the support staff was swift to help me. Since I started using your service, prices have continued to climb. Understandable. I will check other sources before I produce another book.

The end product was fantastic! And I got it in a week, which is unheard of! I was enormously pleased with the books I received. The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is because the program to enter the book isn't as easy as I wish it could be. I had to learn as I went and start over several times because I didn't know how to undo things when I made a mistake. I didn't know how to delete a single page (they are added in pairs), so I had a couple of blank pages in the book. But I want to say again that the speed of arrival and the quality of the books was 5 stars. 10 if I could give them! Thank you!

Review.Titre: Great until they put it in the mail
Review.Contenu: I love the site (although it took a little getting used to) and the book is beautiful, exactly as I'd created it.  I realize that it was coming from Sweden, but it took one month from the order date to the arrival date, which seemed rather slow. That would have been okay if I could have tracked the package but their tracking link listed only the mailing date and nothing else. I got a little nervous.  They were prompt in responding to my inquiry, but gave no ETA or any other information. It finally arrived, though, and we're very happy with the results.

I tried using many different companies, but Solentro was the easiest and with no down loads.  I received my books faster than stated and I am very happy with the end result.  The only drew back I have is the cost.  But to be honest I have used another company which was just a little bit cheaper, but not worth the trouble.Along with the help of Solentro, we have made a wish of mine which was 50 years in the making come to print.  I hope to be writing more in the future and will be using Solentro for my book.It was just very easy for me and with great end results.

I liked how my books turned out. Customer service in terms of reaching them could have been easier and I would have liked to know that my books were being shipped from Europe earlier in the process. Still, all in all it was a good experience and I'd use them again.

Great experience, quick response time from customer service, rapid turnaround, quality product. My only disappointment was that the coupon presented at the beginning of the process ended up being less than what I expected.I would use Solentro again.

Solentro books are professional quality printing and binding materials. The UI and text and photo editing tools are easy and intuitive to use, enabling you to create a quality book. It’s a touch on the expensive side, but you get what you pay for.

Review.Titre: Quality product--took a long time to get
Review.Contenu: I had a hard time with my bank and allowing money transfer, but once I was able to pay for the product, it came fairly quickly and was high quality. The website is easy to use and they deliver what is promised. I will definitely be using them again.

Review.Titre: The tool was relatively easy to use but could use more options.
Review.Contenu: The platform was relatively easy to use. I would've liked a few more options to manipulate photos and adjust fonts. I experienced problems paying, so I'd recommend a few more options for people in the United States...perhaps PayPal.

Great experience! Couldn't believe how fast the shipping process was. Wish it was a little more user friendly/intuitive like other photo book websites. The book we created will be treasured forever. We will be returning customers!

Amazing!!! Came supper fast and it's wonderful quality. I wasn't aware we had to call our credit card company before ordering so that took some time to clear up but other wise I will definitely be using the again!

What a great product with great customer service. My only issue was with the website. I didn’t find it totally user friendly. It took some time to figure out the formatting, but once I did, it was okay.

Review.Titre: The Solentro site is quite good and …
Review.Contenu: The Solentro site is quite good and easy to work with for the most part.  There are a couple of improvements that could be made to make the site easier, however they're fairly minor and overall it works quite well.
The book came in record time. I was a little disappointed in the quality of the book. Its not that its cheaply done but for  $100+ I expected a better quality in the paper and the book itself.
I have used Solentro twice. Both times I have been very satisfied but there needs to be better HELp section with live or close to immediate service to questions.  The site works a little slowly.
I am very pleased with my printed book. It exceeds my expectations. It was  more expensive than I thought it would be. However, to share memories with my family it was well worth the price.

Review.Titre: I was absolutely delighted with your…
Review.Contenu: I was absolutely delighted with your service and the quality of the product! The site was very user friendly and I look forward to using your company again in the future. I provided 4 stars, for what I normally would consider a 5 star review. I attribute this to the fact, I wasn't permitted to obtain the discount for ordering two books.I had to send the books to, two different addresses. I sent an email prior to ordering, inquiring where on the order could the second address be listed. I received a timely response, informing the order would need to be placed separately. There was no mention that in doing so, I could not obtain the discount. I only learned this in placement of my order.As, stated before, the experience was excellent, and I will use again, but I was disappointed not to obtain the two for discount price.

I was looking for a site that would allow narrative with some pictures.  Many sites are geared for making photo books.  I was very pleased when I found Solentro! I did not find the site easy to navigate -- the editing tools are very basic.  The help screens are not helpful at all, but the customer support (via email) was helpful in the times that I emailed them. I got the job done, but they really need to increase the site's ability to edit text and to have more template layouts.  You can create your own page layouts but once made, I could find no way to edit them (resizing pictures, changing the layout of text, etc).  I was very pleased with the completed project and what I saw on the screen is what was produced (and in quality form).  I would use them again, but would really like more editing capability and the ability to adjust photos and text.
All round the easiest formatting I've come across. The quality is good, as is the communication. Just a bit expensive, certainly as soon as one wants colour.
Excellent quality.  My books are beautiful.  It would be five star, but they are on the expensive side.  However, the quality is fantastic so the price is worth it.

Review.Titre: Excellent Company - read shipping FAQ before order
Review.Contenu: I used Solentro to make an anniversary gift book for my sister. The interface of the program was incredibly easy to use so that I could customize to my exact needs. The finished product is beautiful and professional.  My only caveat is that because of the company's location all purchasers should read the FAQ about shipping BEFORE beginning their project. I didn't. The three week shipping time had me sweating furiously about whether or not the book would arrive in time for their anniversary. However, to turn a negative into a positive: when I got too anxious, I emailed the company to ask about shipping details and tracking information and the VERY NEXT MORNING got a personal reply with all the reassurance I needed.  In short: excellent software, excellent product, excellent customer service. Just make sure the timetable works for you!

Review.Titre: Overall a very good experience -- I plan to do it again
Review.Contenu: I was very pleased with my Solentro experience, and I plan to use it again.  I had no previous experience with self-publishing, but I was able to create the book I wanted.  I'm a moderately skilled computer user, and with only one or two hiccups was able to navigate Solentro's templates to get my desired outcome.  The finished book was exactly as promised, and it arrived surprisingly quickly.  I had such a good time with the whole experience that I'm already planning other projects I can create on Solentro.I wish the site offered more options in book sizes and page templates.  When it wasn't clear to me how to do what I wanted, I would have appreciated a chat function to streamline figuring out the answer, instead of going through FAQs and experimenting on my own.  Still, these are fairly minor quibbles; and in the end, I was delighted with the book that resulted.
I had a positive experience with Solentro. It was easy to navigate and I received my book on a timely basis. The only thing I wish they had was spell check.
Good value and high quality.  Tool is a bit clunky but very usable.  Shipping was slow and we missed Christmas by a week, so that was disappointing.

Review.Titre: Ease with which I was able to navigate
Review.Contenu: Ease with which I was able to navigate. Would have love a better process to have pictures automatically resize and fit to document/sheet.

The site was very easy to use, and the finished product pretty impressive for an amateur publication. We used a lot of colored photographs which were crisp and clear, including those that were flagged for possible problems. The facility with which I could add or subtract pages and upload photographs made the whole project much easier.There were a couple of things that I'd like to see. One is a better HELP function with questions and answers. Sometimes I had to read a whole page through before I figured out what I needed to do. Also, (and I don't know how you'd fix this), I ended up using a larger font and therefore editing text (sometimes pretty severely) because I couldn't figure out how the font size would translate to the printed page. Using the preview function really didn't help with that dilemma. Everything turned out fine in the  end, but I didn't really need to spend the time editing that I did. More text and size 8 or size 10 font would have been fine.
Great quality and timely shipping. Website difficult to navigate on mobile phone/iPad, but very pleased with how the product was printed.

Review.Titre: It was a bit expensive but the final…
Review.Contenu: It was a bit expensive but the final product looked very nice. I do wish the that proofreading and text layout tools were a bit more robust.
It was a good purchase. I like the color print, but the font placement was weird and it was hard to correct on the website. Overall, I enjoyed it

Review.Titre: Easy to use, great finished product
Review.Contenu: Once I got the hang of it, it was easy to use. It was inexpensive and shipped within a week. I would use Solentro again!
I LOVED THE BOOK, AND SO DID MY FRIENDS. THE TEXT AND PICTURES LOOKS GREAT.  GOOD JOB !FUN BOOK TO HAVE

Review.Titre: Fantastic quality and the site itself…
Review.Contenu: Fantastic quality and the site itself was easy to use. My only problem was with how pricy it was

Review.Titre: Excellent finished product! Big learning curve!
Review.Contenu: Yes, I would definitely use Solentro again as the final product was just as I'd hoped! However, I will say I didn't find the website overly intuitive. I wish they would post instructional videos on how to use the site, as I felt instruction was lacking (or else I didn't know where to look!). I think the biggest complaint I had was there is no 'word' or 'character' count when typing text. One has no idea when you've run out of space in a particular text box until you're finished typing and go to view the page and see you've run out of space. But it doesn't tell you at what point that happened. So with much trial and error, I finally figured out a system that worked for me. Once I got it down, then it went much smoother. I will say though, for every question I fired at them through email, they were very prompt in responding!  I wish they'd set up live chat sessions however. Many times I was working on the book and I'd have a question, and I'd have to wait until they responded via email as to how to solve the problem. More real time assistance would be wonderful! That said, the final product is exactly what I'd hoped it would be and will definitely use Solentro again!

Overall the site was easy to use, and I LOVED that everything was saved as I went. No worries about losing anything if not saved. It was pretty easy to figure out the basics of how to create the book.The template I used did not offer any option to be creative with using angled placement of text or photos, which would have really added to the final product. Not sure if there are other templates where this could be done. On the plus side, custom templates for pages were pretty easy to make. I was surprised when I placed the order and had both of my credit cards rejected without explanation. I eventually realized that, being a European company, a chip card was required. It would have been nice to know up front, or at least to have an explanation when my cards were rejected. The USA is unfortunately WAY behind Europe in using this technology, and many people don't yet have chip cards. I ended up having my brother pay, and coincidentally, 2 weeks later my new chip card arrived in the mail. One final little issue is that the book covers (I ordered 10 copies) are all warping a bit unless they have weight on top of them. Overall though, it was a great website to use. I'd recommend it to others, but would love to see these little issues addressed.
-Would be good to have an added  ISBN  option and otherwise a bit high cost-wise...=]
Generally liked Solentro.  Publishing cost surprised me, higher than I expected.
Excellent quality book, website easy to use. A little bit on the expensive side.

Review.Titre: For the time being all right
Review.Contenu: I wanted to know how do I get information on the dispatch of my two books. Thanks
thank you.but book was to small and I do not want other one thank you.mary cobb
well I haven't tried it yet ,but I think it's very very good

Review.Titre: Fantastic quality, but typical business aspect
Review.Contenu: Fantastic quality. Unimpressed with the $15-no-watermark condition.

The book turned out great.  I made a journal of when my son was born premature and in the NICU for 107 days.  The book was a good mix of text that I had written previously interlaced with images as he progressed in the hospital.  I knew I had a lot of text to copy and past into the book and Solentro met my needs.  The final quality of the gloss hardback book was great.4 Stars because:1)  The word/image template layouts are limited.  It's great you can customize your own, but some guides to placement would help.  Also would like a good choice of page layout/backgrounds as well as including stickers/captions/labels and free-text options2)  Some images will not be the right resolution in which case it get's a "warning" triangle.  The preview available for such types of images won't show you what you actually will get if you read the Solentro disclaimer.  Luckily my images turned out as expected but this feature made me nervous3) Previewing a page is tedious.  You have to open up the text and then select preview.  Otherwise you have to preview starting from page 1 and selecting the page number you want to go to.  There should be a button on the book preview where you can select a page and preview right from there4) Being a U.S. customer, I didn't realize this was a company in Sweden until I was ready to place an order hoping to get it in time for Mother's day.  I was hoping for more transparent shipping details, like estimate time for arrival upon placing my order.  Not until I received a fedEx tracking number did I know I'd be getting the book 2 weeks later
glad you ship overseas as we have returned to USA

My 10 year old granddaughter has quite an imagination. Over the last year, she had been making up short stories about one of her stuffed animals. For a surprise Christmas gift, I collated the stories and added pictures. Solentros' website was very user friendly. The book was completed and received within 2 weeks. The hardbound cover, colors are very well made with heavy paper for the pages. I will be using Solentro again.

Review.Titre: I loved how easy it was to use
Review.Contenu: I loved how easy it was to use. It shipped fast and was printed well. I thought it was crazy expensive making it impossible to publish. That was the only bummer.

Review.Titre: Always a GREAT fun project when making…
Review.Contenu: Always a GREAT fun project when making a Solentro keepsake! This time books for our grandsons. Added more pictures/memories than I had planned and the books look fabulous! The soft cover square books will be great for little hands.
They changed my shipping info and delivered it before I expected with great quality
Ended up with a beautiful book, after undergoing a fairly steep learning curve. Will use Solentro again.
It was quickly done. Quality was great!!

Exceptional customer service (quick response time, friendly, accommodating) You get exactly what they advertise, and better. The end product looks like it was done from A-Z by a professional, when a mere amateur like me was able to design the whole thing with the help of their excellent online software. Shipping was timely and painless.  I can't recommend them enough...A+++!

Fast turn around time. All 22 copies arrived in perfect shape. Paper quality & thickness, photos, text, binding, everything perfect - even better than I expected. Impressive speed of completion once I hit submit. Timely responses to questions. I do wish the pagination button prompted me for a final yes/no just before hitting submit. Website took a bit to get used to - not as intuitive as I would have liked. That said, once I was familiar with it, it was easy to use. I will be using Solentro again & highly recommend them to you!

Review.Titre: Five stars is putting it mildly....
Review.Contenu: The only reason I tried this site was because of the hundreds of great reviews.  I created a cookbook for my daughter which took me several months to complete and, in my humble opinion, the end product is spectacular....I know she will treasure it.  I had issues in the interim which were resolved immediately and more than satisfactorily.  The shipping time was quicker than anticipated.  I cannot say enough good things about my experience.  I would highly recommend Solentro to anyone...once you get the hang of how to use all the features you will not be disappointed that you chose them for your project.  I look forward to using them again. Thank you SOLENTRO!!!!

I ordered 2 separate books from our beautiful July wedding - a larger (Maxi Panorama) for ourselves and our adult kids and a smaller (square) copy for a few close friends. With 500+ awesome pictures to chose from I knew I had a big project on my hands but I enjoyed a fun, rainy week-end being creative and they arrived from Sweden to the US remarkably fast! And the books are fabulous! High quality, color-sharp and a pure delight to hold & see. I would highly recommend Solentro for any photo book project.

It took me some time to figure out how to get the text and pictures arranged exactly as I wanted but there was always a way to do it.  After I became fluent with the process, it was actually quite fun.  There are ways put photos and text in a premade format or personalized formats can be created.  I really liked that flexibility.  When I realized the company was not in the US I figured it would take some time to receive the finished product but I was so wrong!  Within a few days of submitting the book it was finished and shipped out. I received notification and tracking information from FedEx immediately and was notified every day detailing where the book was. I received it within a week which was totally unexpected.  The book is beautiful and I will certainly create more projects with them in the future.
Beautifully done, delivery surprisingly fast and very reasonably priced.  I could not be happier with the final product. Thanks so much!  It was exactly what I wanted.

The book is beautiful, quality, professional and a fantastic glossy look. It came very fast and packaged well.The learning curve was a bit steep for me, not having done anything like this before, but I see that new learning tools have been added since then.Customer service was very helpful. I love that everything is saved automatically.I'm happy I chose Solentro.

I created a beautiful book using Solentro.  The pictures were true in color to the ones submitted and that was very important to me.  I found Solentro very easy to use.  I have made several children's books previously.  The latest book was 92 pages of my nature photos and text.   I was extremely happy with the results.  I will always use Solentro when creating a book.
I've done several books on Solentro and love their service. Easy to use and great quality.

Had a great time writing a cute little novelty gift for my girlfriend. Shipping was an absolute nightmare and the website user interface could most definitely use an upgrade both on desktop and mobile but man the book quality came out amazing. Definitely will be coming back to make another small book for my mom very soon.

Working a Solentro has been a pleasure from beginning to end. The software is top notch - easy yet more powerful and flexible than any other I found. There were no unexpected charges for the voluminous pictures I uploaded and included. The final product arrived more quickly than I would have ever expected considering it was shipped from the other side of the world. And it is beautiful. Fully met and even exceeded my expectations for quality. I would happy recommend and use this company again. Thank you Solentro for a great experience and a memory book my son will forever cherish.

I was very pleased! While putting my book together, Solentro staff answered my questions and offered support in a timely way.  I LOVED the finished product.  My little book actually arrived slightly damaged from the shipping process.  Solentro very promptly sent me another book which arrived in perfect condition!  I highly recommend Solentro!

I’m updating my review. Solentro has top notch customer service! Wow! I’m impressed with this alone. My book is on its way and I’m so excited to see it. The digital copy looks fantastic! I recommend this company to everyone. The experience of making the book was delightful. I cannot wait to use Solentro again to make another book. I’m hooked!

I needed a way to create a text-only book with a photo cover. Solentro allowed me to do that easily with professional results. Unbelievable, the 2 books I ordered did arrive within 1-2 weeks. One had loose pages. When I brought this to Solentro's attention, I got an immediate reply and they shipped me not one but two books, again in only 1-2 weeks. I give Solentro high marks for quality of service, quality of product and quick turnaround.

I made Disney picture books for myself as well as for my sons and their families after our fabulous February week at Disney World. The books returned to me in United State in a week and we are all delighted with both the picture quality as well as the sturdy quality of the books, perfect even for our young grandson's lil' fingers to turn the pages in to remember our wonderful Disney days, bringing endless smiles. High quality, fast delivery and all-around fabulous books! And even though the books were 84 pages I wish I would have added even more pictures!

Easy to build, and order.  Came faster than I anticipated.  Maybe an estimate on how quickly assembly and shipping may be?  Not that fast service is a bad thing - it's good.  Trying to think of something constructive besides just positive feedback.

Review.Titre: This book was simply amazing for our high school graduate!
Review.Contenu: This book was simply amazing for our daughter's graduation gift. Friends and family wrote well wishes and sent photos to me via email. I then placed those writings and photos into this book.  Now when our daughter is at college missing friends and family, she can read all about how much they love her and remember the fun memories that go along with each person that played such an important role in her life. It was a joy to make! The site is easy to navigate, and fun to create. I only wish the writing automatically went onto the next page if there are photos involved.

We created an album with photos and stories from my mother for her 80th birthday. The software took a minute to learn but was very flexible. We put in photos with captions along with pages of text/stories in various layouts including many custom page arrangements. That flexibility is why we chose this product. It took us 3 months of off and on work, but each time we returned it was there safe and sound.Once we ordered it was made and delivered shockingly fast. The books are beautiful and professional.  I love that I also got a PDF.

I have published two books with Solentro. I am so pleased with my latest book. The finished product looks amazing. The creative process was easy to navigate, adding pictures, texts, etc. After I placed the order, my book was expeditiously delivered in a short period of time. I will definitely be going back to Solentro for my next project.

Outstanding work! Quick! Answered any questions I had! Would recommend and use again! This was an amazing Christmas gift for my grandsons parents! A keepsake the will be treasured forever! My grandson was so surprised by the stories being in a book! He is already interested in doing another book maybe a story this time he says!Great confidence booster! So pleased!

I enjoyed creating my book on the Solentro site and it was an easy process. There are many options to personalize the project; from book size to the layout of photos and text. The finished book arrived quickly and the quality is amazing! I liked that my work was automatically saved every time I worked on it. I greatly appreciated that even though it took me over nine months to complete my book (not my intent when I started) it was never deleted. Even when I didn't log in for months as I worked on it. Thank you. I will be returning with another project!

Software was intuitive. A stripped down Word, containing the basics needed in a text tool. Short learning curve. Templates were customizable which shows someone was thinking in designing the product. I found the software in line with the 80/20 principle. A good core program (80%) and the ability to customize (20%). I could have never completed my book project without the useful tool Solentro provided. Nice choices in book format, especially considering my 88 year old mother chooses not to own a computer. Having a choice of hardcover book formats was essential for my situation. I would not hesitate to recommend Solentro to anyone who wants to self publish a book. The customer service was above my expectations too.

Review.Titre: Exceptional Product, Great Service and Price
Review.Contenu: I had never used Solentro before but based on the exceptional reviews, I created a book of photography with prose. The program was user friendly and the final result is wonderful! I only ordered one book just to make sure I would like the final product. I LOVE it. I just ordered five more books to use as gifts. I'm already planning on another book. Thank you, Solentro, for quality and great service!

Review.Titre: Dad said it’s the best gift I’ve ever given!
Review.Contenu: My Grandmother was very happy with her memoir book. This company is fast and efficient. They will allow upload of photos that gave smaller pixels whereas other companies require you to fix that which is harder to do with older photos. I would use them again.

Review.Titre: Surprisingly enjoyable experience.                         Not only was the experience quite easy
Review.Contenu: Not only was the experience quite easy, but was extremely enjoyable.  It took me months to finish my book because it was the first time I ever attempted anything like this. Each time I went in to add or subtract something, I learned more and more.  The final book is stunning and I intend to order more copies.

This was my first time putting a book together and I can’t believe how easy it was. The steps were clear, there were numerous templates to choose from, an easy process to build your own templates, and the few times that I still had a specific question, I received a response the same day. I definitely suggest Solentro for your book producing and publishing needs!

Exceeded my expectations in all areas. Web sight is easy to understand and navigate. Product description is good but actual product was amazing. Product preview is accurate in size, font and color. The most impressive part was the delivery time, four days, wow. I thought it was a little pricey, but when I had the books in my hand I was definitely ok with it. More font choices would be nice.

There was an unexpected problem with the book I created and ordered, simply due to human error . . . I got a prompt response to my inquiry about it, that was gracious and kind, and my book was replaced at no cost. I am beyond thrilled with this special book that documents the life of my beloved niece, who just turned 18. She will treasure this gift for a lifetime . . .

We created a yearbook for our team to celebrate the laughs and great memories over this past year. It was a wonderful surprise, and we will do this yearly moving forward. The quality and print was perfect! We were thrilled with the books upon receipt, and cannot wait to create our next project!

The books arrived soon after I ordered them. Three of the four were perfect. One had some binding defects. I contacted Solentro, sent pictures of the damaged book, and they quickly sent a replacement. Great customer service, easy to communicate with.

Review.Titre: I'm EXTREMELY happy with both books…
Review.Contenu: I'm EXTREMELY happy with both books that I worked on and ordered from Solentro. I was looking for a way to create a book that allowed both longer passages of type AND options for pictures/photos with/without captions. The directions and any changes were easy to make. I was especially impressed with the vibrant, clarity of photos on cover and pages of books. Thank you, Solento.  I'm a very pleased customer!

Where do I start?  I can't say enough positive things about my experience with Solentro!  My book - a 260-page book of memories - is beautiful!  I am so happy with the cover, and the quality of the pages is amazing.  Most of the photographs included are very old, some more than 70 years, but the end result works.  My two email contacts with Customer Service were answered promptly with responses that were helpful.  I am located in the United States, and my books still arrived in less than two weeks.  I am a 77-year-old woman.  If I can navigate the Solentro website with no problems, it should be a breeze for those that are younger with more computer expertise.

THEY WERE AMAZING. The website functioned EXACTLY the way I wanted it to, it was intuitive and creative and I loved the ease of functionality. The prices are incredible for such a QUALITY product. I was SO excited to see how amazing it turned out, I honestly wasn't expecting it to be as nicely finished and beautiful as it was! 10/10 would work with Solentro again. Fast shipping, great service. Seriously I'm still astonished at how nice my little book turned out.

Reasonably easy interface to figure out, and the printed quality was good. Glossy cover option was nice, too. Product arrived in about 10 days though shipped from overseas--give yourself lots of lead time.

Excellent..  Printing sharp.  My only suggestion is that it would be nice to be able to print my mini book more to the margins of the page.  The size is limited and somewhat small.  They responded immediately but unfortunately that cannot be done for this book.  They suggested a larger book but I want the actual book to be smaller.  There is quite a bit of free margin space around the text portion.

Review.Titre: The People at Solentro and My Book
Review.Contenu: The people at Solentro were always quick to respond to my questions.  Since this was my first time to make a book, there were many. They were always helpful in straightening out my mistakes and telling me how to proceed when I felt stuck. Their suggestions were stated clearly.Contacting them was as convenient as asking the person in the next room.Solentro made putting my stories together for my grandchildren exciting. I  am thoroughly pleased with my experience with them.My book is beautiful. The paper feels very nice. All the print is totally crisp.Judyth WhiteGreensboro, North CarolinaUSA

Review.Titre: Great experience / User Friendly / High Quality Results
Review.Contenu: My overall experience was really great.  While I have made various photo albums with well recognized websites, this is the first time I used Solentro to develop a "book" with photos.  Solentro was user friendly and took only a short period of time to get familiar with the editing and creative tools.  The end product was absolutely fantastic!  I recommend their website for other users and I look forward to using it again myself.

Review.Titre: I was blown away when I received my…
Review.Contenu: I was blown away when I received my book. It is absolutely beautiful. The type is crisp, the colors vibrant, and the glossy paper stock I chose is top quality. When I sent the project to Solentro, I was concerned about some of the photos I used. The resolution was iffy. To my amazement, all of the photos turned out great! Customer service was excellent, too. I emailed a couple of questions and received wonderful feedback in record time. This company deserves much more than five stars!!!

Review.Titre: The books turned out super cute
Review.Contenu: The books turned out super cute! Got one hung up in the mail but it was the Holiday and out of there hands as it was sent via FedEx. I was skeptical of using this company simply because so many scams around but I am glad I did and I will use it again for any future book creations I need.

Review.Titre: This was a really fun way to create a…
Review.Contenu: This was a really fun way to create a meaningful gift for both my daughter and daughter in law that included advice from friends and family!  The final product was high quality and something we all eagerly display for others to browse.  Using the website to put together the book had all the tools needed, with pre-formatted page templates and lots of additional options.  I had a couple questions during the process, and customer service was quick to reply.  While my order was delayed by the delivery service for several days, the books eventually made it in time for the baby shower I wanted to present it at, and it was very well received.  I'd highly recommend Solentro to others!

Review.Titre: A great service for a personalized book!
Review.Contenu: I made a little book of "Dad quotes" with pictures for my Dad's 80th birthday and it turned out so great! The book looked exactly as it appeared in the "Preview" on the site. It took me a little bit to get used to how to work the site, but once I figured it out, it was pretty user friendly and perfect for what I needed to create. The book arrived pretty fast considering it was coming from overseas to the US. I would use them again!

Review.Titre: I used Solentro to create 2 short story…
Review.Contenu: I used Solentro to create 2 short story books my children wrote as Christmas presents. The quality of the books was so much better than expected. It took a little bit to get the formatting down, but they came together beautifully.  I would highly recommend and will be using Solentro again

Review.Titre: They gave me exactly what I wanted
Review.Contenu: They gave me exactly what I wanted. I will admit, they are more expensive than other companies that create books but I get what I paid for.

My fifth order now, not a single issue.Some stuff went bad with the courier (but that is a courier issue), and Solentro delivered instantly and with proper customer service it all worked out.Always been super happy with the results of everything I ordered and its always been delivered on time. 10/10 will order again.

Review.Titre: Our Adoption Journey chronicled for our daughter.
Review.Contenu: I found the site easy to navigate and I was able to download the text and pictures without difficulty.  We got the final product and we are very happy.  We chronicled the process my wife and I went though to adopt our daughter 18 years ago and now that she is 20 we can't wait to give her this gift for Christmas!  Thgank you for creating this site for anyone to make their own book!

Blown away by the quality of the product. Looks and feels great. Photos and text are very clear and the product looks heavy duty. I wish there was a little bit more communication between purchase and delivery, like a tracking number or something, but I'm definitely happy with my purchase.

Review.Titre: I very much enjoyed the ease of…
Review.Contenu: I very much enjoyed the ease of creating my book on Solentro. The process was fairly smooth and user friendly. I will definitely use again. The only challenge I had is that the website continued to freeze which necessitated my having to exist and log in numerous times.

Amazing Platform.  I am 60 years of age and very technically challenged.
