I found the learning of how to make a book for my children of their fathers life a very pleasurable experience.I have shared this with my friends and hope to possibly do another.Thank you so much for making it super enjoyable for a old gal like me!Jill

Review.Titre: Book quality was excellent & on time
Review.Contenu: Quality was excellent. You responded to my questions before placing my order altho it took 24-48 hrs. Delivery arrived on the day I requested as it was a birthday gift. Thank you! Gift was very much appreciated. I would use Solentro again

This website is awesome! I used it to create a photo/diary book of the first three years of a granddaughter's life. It took me more than four months to finish this project *70 pages total*, and Solentro kept all my photos and my narrative perfectly safe and just like I left them each time. Because it lets you design templates as you desire, YOU are in complete charge of each page's design. It never failed me. I don't know how long they store these creations, but I hope it is for a long time so that I can order more of the books and also make changes as I desire. All in all, this was a five-out-of-five-star experience.

Review.Titre: I am totally blown away at Solentro
Review.Contenu: I am totally blown away at Solentro.  The workmanship they put in the book I made was amazing, but what amazed me more was the care they took when they sent the book back to me.  The turn around time was incredibly fast.  The book had to travel across 4 countries (Sweden, Denmark, Germany and the US) plus cross the Atlantic Ocean.  When the book arrived at my residence, it was in perfect condition.  I would highly recommend Solentro to everyone.  I will be using them again in the future.  I also did not find their prices to be that high, considering the beautiful work they do.   Thank you Solentro.

Review.Titre: I made a book for my great…
Review.Contenu: I made a book for my great granddaughter whose 5 years old, so she will have something to remember her Great Mammaw & Pappaw by, when she's older and we're no longer living. It turned out absolutely beautiful! The pictures so sharp and everything just as I had ordered. I plan on doing this for each of my great grandchildren when they reach the age of 5 because I keep them during the day while their parents work and want them to have memories of our times together. Also, this shipped out quickly and was delivered with a week. What a blessing! I couldn't recommend Solentro more highly! Great Company!

I designed a "memory book" to give to my wife on our 50th Anniversary.  I couldn't be more pleased with how it turned out.  I was concerned that while I am in the USA and Solentro is in Sweden that it would be a problem.  It was not.  They were very responsive in answering my emails when I had questions.  And shipping, once the book was completed, arrived in less than two weeks via FedEx.I struggled a bit using the design templates but that was due to lack of familiarity.  After a couple weeks, I had no problems and truly found the design experience to be fun.  Print and paper quality was excellent. The final product arrived and it looked spectacular.  Exactly the way I viewed the book online in "preview" mode.  Pricing was very fair and reasonable.  Overall, I couldn't be happier with the final product and do not hesitate to recommend Solentro to anybody.

Awesome experience! My book turned out terrific. The website was easy to use and the preview feature displayed the end product very accurately.  I was very satisfied with the quality of the paper and the look of my book. The shipping and production time were very reasonable. I will definitely use Solentro again!

Review.Titre: Don’t judge a book by its cover
Review.Contenu: The ability to put together a custom book is amazing. The website was easy to use for the most part. I’m not sure what happened but the cover of my book was upside down and on the back page but other than that, a great experience. Maybe I missed a note about the cover but that might be an area to improve on if others have made the same mistake.

This book turned out amazing! We created a “new baby” book for a coworker that was filled with quotes, what to do/not to do, best/worst memories, advice etc. from the team. The website is not the most user friendly site there is, but for the quality of the book… it was great!!! I also reached out to their customer service for help getting it expedited. Solentro’s customer service was extremely responsive and did all they could to expedite the book, without asking for additional $$. I would highly recommend Solentro - just give yourself time to work through their site. But the outcome is MORE than worth the time navigating their site. I would definitely purchase from them again!!!

Review.Titre: Easy to use and great quality!
Review.Contenu: I tried several other publishing companies and Solentro was by far the easiest to use. When my order arrived I was very impressed. The quality of the book was fantastic! I will be using them again and I have already told a friend who just made her first order.

The book that I received was INCREDIBLE!! I will recommend this company to anyone and everyone. We created a book of letter that’s we wrote to my grandma and it included pictures that turned out so beautiful inside the book! Use this company, they really do a great job bringing books to life!!

The overall process of making the book was really easy and allowed for the double checking and editing to be done easily. I gave the book as a gift to a friend and they really were impressed and enjoyed it a whole lot!! I would recommend to anyone wanting to easily print a book that they've always wanted to print.

The book came out amazing including the quality of all the pictures. The website was also easy to use and did not take long to figure out how it works. The shipping also took two weeks which was exactly what was expected.

I could not be more happy with Solentro! I made a book for my son for his HS graduation. I had been compiling birthday letters over the years that I had written to him and wanted to find a service that allowed me to turn all my letters into a book, along with pictures. I had never heard of this company, nor known anyone to use them, so I was taking a big gamble with spending hours upon hours making the book. I was so happy with the completed project. My son loves it and is still making his way through it. I will definitely use them again for both of my daughter's graduation books!

Review.Titre: Great service when you need a custom book made and when quality counts.
Review.Contenu: The book I had made was a very important remembrance of a dear family member who passed.  The book is totally professional and will last for years. The one thing that wasn't clear to me when I started this process is that the book was going to be made in sweden. Well that isn't a problem the shipping details after the book was completed were a little challenging to follow. I worried that I was not going to get this book in time however in the end it arrived on day 15 after my order was placed. So honestly the 7 to 14 day time period hat is stated is about as accurate as you can get. In the end I was extremely satisfied.

Review.Titre: I am super pleased with the final…
Review.Contenu: I am super pleased with the final product. My book was a personalized collection for my daughter's high school graduation. She and I both love our copies and they will be priceless memories for us and generations to come.

Putting together my book using Solentro.com Is one of the best experiences I’ve ever had. My finished book is beautiful, the quality of the paper and print and color is exceptional. I plan to do another book soon.

Review.Titre: My experience with Solentro was most…positive!
Review.Contenu: My experience with Solentro was most positive. Their customer service (thank you, Emy) was excellent! I had several questions regarding the creation of my book, and she patiently and courteously answered them all. The respect she demonstrated gives me the incentive to use Solentro for my next project.

I have written two books, one for each of my grandsons. So, my opinion is not built on sales. I will visit Solentro one more time to write a story for my granddaughter. I have enjoyed both projects and have been very pleased with the books that were printed. I hope my grandchildren will enjoy them even more as they grow older! Solentro certainly has surpassed my expectations.
Easy to use. Responsive customer service. Quick turnaround considering my location in the United States. This will be such a special gift for our best friends who are new parents!

I've made two books with Solentro.com. I love the many customization options and creative freedom I have to decorate my book! I'd like to possibly make an 11x 14 book someday on your site! Great website!

Honestly, I did not now the book was coming from Sweden until I paid. I was worried I wouldn't get it in time for the wedding I was officiating. Reading the reviews about poor customer service and shipping has be worried as well. First hand experience, the customer service team was very responsive. I sent about 9 emails in a row asking if my book is ready and they kept me informed all the way. Ask for Ebba, hands down best service ever, wish I could talk to her but everything is via email. Get that lady a promotion, for real. Fed Ex now has my package and it should arrive on time pending any Fed Ex delays. I hope it comes in time. Great stuff Solentro, appreciate the quick responses. Again, PROMOTE EBBA!!!! Rich Catalano

Review.Titre: Though the site looks a little…
Review.Contenu: Though the site looks a little old-fashioned, once one learns how to use it, it's a very efficient system and, ultimately, produces professional-looking, and high-quality books. Because the site hasn't changed in over five years, it also allowed me to make a book that looked very similar to one I had made five years ago which, for a fifth and tenth anniversary present, made things very helpful.

Review.Titre: Cannot be more happy!  HIGH QUALITY product
Review.Contenu: I had a 12 page color staple-bound booklet made.  it's even better than I expected, in all ways!  I did take a chance by producing mine a little unconventional.  I already had a 12 page PDF format design, with a nice layout of text and pictures.  So I simply took a screen-shot on my MAC computer of each page, then uploaded each imaged (JPG) page into the template.  Thus, I simply uploaded 12 images, which consisted of my pre-populated text and images!  Bingo!  it worked perfect:  crystal clear images and clear, readable font.  Solentro should inform the user that this is an option, or Solentro should have a simple PDF upload ability that can be converted to the draft for submittal.  But my attempted as described worked soo perfect.  The paper quality is also very nice.  I went with the glossy cover which is great.  the inside pages are also of high quality, heavier stock, mat finish.  Lastly, I submitted my order on 1/8/22 and got my product on 1/24/22, here in Seattle!  I cannot be happier!  And prices are nice.

Review.Titre: Brilliant Product & Service for College gift
Review.Contenu: Made book of quotes and photos for college bound kid. Terrifically easy, outstanding speed and finished product was brilliant

Review.Titre: User friendly interface- quick and easy…
Review.Contenu: User friendly interface- quick and easy order and shipping process. Great quality of product

Review.Titre: If I could give them more than 5 stars I would
Review.Contenu: I created a poetry book for my uncle for Christmas this year, probably one of the most heartfelt gifts I have ever made for anyone. I ordered my books about a little over a week ago and received them today (I live in the US). They were ABSOLUTELY PERFECT, they were more beautiful than I had even imagined and I could not be happier. I was so worried I had ordered them too late and because of holiday shipping delays they wouldn’t get here by Christmas, but they got here so fast I was amazed. This book is so special to me I almost hugged the FedEx guy who delivered them. Thank you Solentro and FedEx for all your hard work, you are going to make this a very special Christmas for my family. I will 10000% be using this company again and I absolutely recommend it everyone. It is absolutely worth the money. THANK YOU!!!

I decided to publish a book that was very personal to my family and I.  It dealt with the passing of my mother just over a year ago.  Solentro made the process easy and the book turned out fantastic!  I ordered 2 extra books to give to my family for Christmas.  I’m grateful that a company like this exists.

Price was reasonable. Product was good. Emails informed me that they got the information I submitted, and when the product was shipped. Some of my pictures were old, scanned numerous times, but I was very happy with the results in my book.

Review.Titre: I am delighted with the finished book!
Review.Contenu: I am delighted with the finished book. My husband passed away on August 9, 2021 and I wanted to share his writings and photos with family and friends. I wanted it to be a quality publication and that is what I got with Solentro. I am so happy. Everyone who has received one so far is so impressed. Thank you for preserving our memories.

Review.Titre: I love the quality of the book and how…
Review.Contenu: I love the quality of the book and how much it truly means to me AND to my daughter. The book was to speak to my little one in a way that could built respect and appreciation to herself with how her peers treat her. She reads it (The Violet Heart) every day
We ordered a 120 page book.  Very impressed!  Professional looking, just like a real book.  Pictures and colors turned out beautifully. Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: I thoroughly enjoyed creating my book "Close Your Eyes... Breathe... Listen"
Review.Contenu: I thoroughly enjoyed creating my book on Solentro. The site is easy to navigate and provides a lot of templates from which to choose. Solentro is user friendly and is a wonderful website to use to create and personalize a book.

Loved this service. I used it to create a custom hard cover book, with photos and text, and it turned out beautifully. It looks professional and I plan to purchase another custom project from Solentro in the future.

Review.Titre: This book was a Mother's Day gift to my…
Review.Contenu: This book was a Mother's Day gift to my mom. They were all the letters written by her parents to each other during World War II. She absolutely adored the book. Thank you for making that possible for her.

This was an easy, great experience. I created a book of poetry for my almost 90 year old dad. Shipping was crazy fast, especially considering it came from Europe to the US. The book looks great. Kinda pricey, but worth every penny!

I have ordered several personalized book from Solentro over the last several years and each and every one is simply beautiful and awesome quality.  I highly recommend Solentro to anyone who would love to make a personalized book whether it’s a recipe book or a special heirloom book of your family or grand babies. ♥️ Solentro are a very reputable company and will be there constantly throughout your book journey with any help you may need. 📕💕
Excellent, easy to use.  Send links to people for their submission, a simple click and easy to follow instructions where you can add a note and upload photos.  Great product/service.

Been very happy with getting my books through Solentro.  This is the 6th book I’ve done through them.  Always order a back up on my singles, yet found one of them to be a little darker on the photos then the other.  I edit my pictures for brightness, contrast, exposure, saturation, blackpoint, etc.  Some did not seem to come back to me the way I put them in.  Not sure if I need to change from glossy to matte, or what is best for picture books.  Still very satisfied with overall product.  I will be changing from jpeg to raw, and will be able to do a much better editing job for the next book.  Fred

Review.Titre: I really love the book I created
Review.Contenu: I really love the book I created. It looks very professional. A bit pricey and the website is a bit of a learning curve but I will recommend Solentro to others who want to create a custom book.

Review.Titre: I was very pleased with the book
Review.Contenu: I was very pleased with the book. Absolutely beautiful look all around. I will be making another one as soon as I put it all together. Awesome work! Highly recommend it.

Review.Titre: I am not a tech savvy person so I…
Review.Contenu: I am not a tech savvy person so I appreciated the fairly straightforward and easy software program allowing me to create a book of poems with some pictures.  I would definitely use the company again.
Great experience, was able to track my order thru the whole process. Shipping was within a reasonable time frame. Book turned out beautifully.

Review.Titre: I wrote of book of poems and pictures…
Review.Contenu: I wrote of book of poems and pictures for my 4 month granddaughter. I have stage four cancer and I wanted something personal for her to remember me by. Although it took a bit for the book to arrive it was well worth the wait! I ordered the hard back, white book and it was everything I wanted it to be. There were two mistakes in the book, my doing, not Solentro's, two poems were  published back to back. And a mistprint in one of the poems. But with that being said. The book is awesome. I did have an inquiry and Solentro was very quick to respond.All in all I would recommend Solentro to anyone who wants a professionaly looking end product.
Solentro allowed me to create the book that I wanted with all the flexibleness that I needed. The website was very user friendly and the book came quickly. I was very pleased with my experience.

Review.Titre: The quality of the books from Solentro…
Review.Contenu: The quality of the books from Solentro are top notch! I have made 4 books and each one turned out excellent, especially picture quality.

Review.Titre: I created a small book of Bible verses…
Review.Contenu: I created a small book of Bible verses to share with my friends and family, and was very pleased with the results! The website was easy to use and the order was easy to place and I received the books in a very timely manner. I highly recommend this company!
